name: Burgle Buddies (with split screen)
description:
In Burgle Buddies split screen version, both players play at the same time! The red player tries to get items while avoiding the enemies and put them (or tries not to put them) in the middle tables. The green player takes the items from the middle table and puts them back where they belong. Only the starting red player(left player) switches to green when spotted by the enemy now, when the green is spotted by the enemy, the red (left player) is affected and will turn from red to green or green to red which may aid or sabotage them.

The left player uses the w, a, s, and d keys to move around, while the right player uses the arrow keys. Collectible items can be collected or placed down by running into the table they are on/you want to place them on.
